com.google.crypto.tink.apps.paymentmethodtoken

Class JwtKeyConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.crypto.tink.apps.paymentmethodtoken.JwtKeyConverter

  • public final class JwtKeyConverter
extends Object
    Functions that convert raw keys into Tink JWT Signature keys.

    These functions are currently just an example, and are not (yet) part of the public API.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static com.google.crypto.tink.jwt.JwtEcdsaPublicKey fromBase64EncodedNistP256PublicKey(String based64EncodedEcNistP256PublicKey)
      Converts an uncompressed Base64 encoded ECDSA public key for NIST P-256 Curve into a Tink JwtEcdsaPublicKey with algorithm ES256.
      static com.google.crypto.tink.jwt.JwtEcdsaPrivateKey fromBased64EncodedPkcs8EcNistP256PrivateKey(String based64EncodedPkcs8EcNistP256PrivateKey, com.google.crypto.tink.jwt.JwtEcdsaPublicKey publicKey, com.google.crypto.tink.SecretKeyAccess access)
      Converts a Base64 encoded PKCS8 ECDSA private key for NIST P-256 Curve into a Tink JwtEcdsaPrivateKey with algorithm ES256.
      static String toBase64EncodedNistP256PublicKey(com.google.crypto.tink.jwt.JwtEcdsaPublicKey publicKey)
      Converts a JwtEcdsaPublicKey using algorithm ES256 to an uncompressed Base64 encoded ECDSA public key for NIST P-256 Curve.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • fromBased64EncodedPkcs8EcNistP256PrivateKey

        public static com.google.crypto.tink.jwt.JwtEcdsaPrivateKey fromBased64EncodedPkcs8EcNistP256PrivateKey(String based64EncodedPkcs8EcNistP256PrivateKey,
                                                                                                        com.google.crypto.tink.jwt.JwtEcdsaPublicKey publicKey,
                                                                                                        com.google.crypto.tink.SecretKeyAccess access)
                                                                                                 throws GeneralSecurityException
        Converts a Base64 encoded PKCS8 ECDSA private key for NIST P-256 Curve into a Tink JwtEcdsaPrivateKey with algorithm ES256.

        It also requires that you provide the corresponding JwtEcdsaPublicKey.

        Throws:
        GeneralSecurityException
